author: Ground News
title: Ground News - India: Terrorists gun down retired police officer during mosque prayer in Jammu and Kashmir's Baramulla
text:
Summary by Ground News The slain former police officer was identified as Mohd. Shafi, according to Jammu and Kashmir Police. The area was cordoned off in the immediate aftermath of the incident. Additional security forces have been deployed in the Bafliaz area of Poonch district. Share menu More
Filters 6 Articles 6 Articles All Left Center Right
NDTV Lean Left Mixed Factuality Independent: Independent Media Individual: Gautam Adani Retired Kashmir Cop Shot Dead By Terrorists While Praying In Mosque A retired police officer was shot dead by terrorists during Azan in Jammu and Kashmir's Baramulla today. Kashmir police said that terrorists fired on Mohammed Shafi during Azan in the mosque.

Mohammed Shafi Mir was a retired senior superintendent of police and was a resident of Gantamulla Bala village in Baramulla.
